title: Behavior Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Children's Specialized Hospital
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was fast. I had an interview with the clinical director. She was very nice and easy to talk to. I received an offer the next day and accepted immediately
Interview Questions: Why are you interested in working with children with pediatric feeding disorders?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 months. I interviewed at Children's Specialized Hospital (Mountainside, NJ) in Oct 2021
Interview Descriptions: I applied online in June then received an email for open interviews in October. I signed up for a time slot for my interview through a link provided. Interview was short and sweet, and she only asked me to “tell me about yourself.” She also spent a lot of time talking about the facility and answering my questions. HR contacted me a day later with an offer.

title: Rec Therapy Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 6 weeks. I interviewed at Children's Specialized Hospital (Toms River, NJ) in Oct 2021
Interview Descriptions:
It started out as a phone interview, to go over what exactly the job is. Then an on-site interview was offered. 
At the on-site interview, we took a tour of the facility and discussed expectations and all of the things available to employees.
Interview Questions:
What ideas do you have for activities?
How flexible is your schedule?

title: Diff Positions-coord, Registrar, Etc Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Children's Specialized Hospital in Aug 2021
Interview Descriptions: Group interview went well and was open to many diff people and their experience. There were many people in the room with experience and I got called. Salary offer wasn't what I expected especially me working in ny with a bunch of experience but I hope for growth within.

title: RN Floor Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Children's Specialized Hospital
Interview Descriptions: it went really well, answered all my questions and discussed the position at length. Even took me on a tour of the floor. Introduced me to some of the other nurses on the floor and left me with the RN to further discuss the unit.
Interview Questions: what was the patient to nurse ratio.

title: Speech Language Pathologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Children's Specialized Hospital in Jun 2021
Interview Descriptions: Easy, virtual. I spoke with the department head and they described the duties and day-to-day experience. They seemed desperate to hire. TIme was allotted to ask additional questions. Seemed less formal. Very kind.
Interview Questions: What is your experience in the field

title: Extern Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Children's Specialized Hospital
Interview Descriptions: Two people interviewed me at once. very conversational and professional. They asked for specific case conceptualization and showed interest in experience with children. They also appreciated that I was open to multiple opportunities within the hospital, not just assessment.
Interview Questions: Can you explain this experience on your CV?

title: Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Children's Specialized Hospital in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions: Two rounds of interviews. First virtual with 2 people. Progressed to second in person interview with an additional 3 people. Then went on tour of facility with another staff member

title: Patient Care Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Children's Specialized Hospital in Apr 2019
Interview Descriptions:
I applied online, heard back within 3 days, and confirmed for a group interview the following week.
There were at least 10 other people at the group interview, and they went around asking everyone the same questions. The interviewers were really friendly and tried to keep the mood a little more lighthearted. The whole process took almost 3 hours as we had to wait for a manager to interview everyone individually after the group interview. 
They said that we would hear back within a week but didn't hear anything from them for a while.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work at Children's Specialized Hospital?

title: Patient Liaison Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Children's Specialized Hospital (Somerset, NJ) in Apr 2019
Interview Descriptions: Interview process ways pretty quick but it seems like the women that interviewed me at the Somerset office were intimidated by my presence. I didn’t think that being presentable was going to be a downside for me. One woman kept staring at my watch and my pedicure...smh. There’s is NO COMMUNICATION even when you are no longer being considered for the position. HR and the interviewing process is lax.

title: Environmental Service Aide Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Children's Specialized Hospital (Mountainside, NJ) in May 2017
Interview Descriptions: It was great! We had got invited to complete interviews on a website. There were around 8 questions that were relatively easy questions. More so on the behavioral side.
Interview Questions: Question: What does excellence mean to you?

title: Respiratory Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Children's Specialized Hospital (New Brunswick, NJ) in Nov 2016
Interview Descriptions: The interview process went fairly well. You first have to do a video interview. The video interview has questions on the screen. It is asked one by one. You have about a minute to gather your thoughts then you can record your answer. After you record your answer then you can move onto the next question. The video interview goes by quickly. You can finish it in less than ten minutes. If they are still interested in you then you will get called into the department you're applying to for a face to face interview.
Interview Questions: How would you describe a good manager?

title: Physical Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Children's Specialized Hospital (New Brunswick, NJ) in Oct 2016
Interview Descriptions: Video interview was given in stead of phone/in person interview. It was not in person. You log in to the link and get practice questions first, and you can keep practicing until comfortable. when ready, you start the process. You are limited to 2-3 minutes to answer each question.
Interview Questions: How did you help someone/friend in need

title: Internship Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Children's Specialized Hospital (New Brunswick, NJ) in Apr 2016
Interview Descriptions: I went to Rutgers University and a professor of mine suggested I reach out to CSH to see if they had any internship opportunities. I contacted the person suggested and she reached out to me within 2 days. We spoke on the phone and she asked me questions. She then asked me to come meet in person to discuss moving forward and some of my goals for this internship. I was also given a tour of the hospital in New Brunswick.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in 5 years?

title: Psychotherapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Children's Specialized Hospital (New Brunswick, NJ) in Dec 2015
Interview Descriptions: Call interview & then in person interview with two supervisors who asked questions about past experiences. Must have vaccinations and attend medical appointment prior to starting to be sure all shots are up to date. Requires some evenings.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Children's Specialized Hospital
Interview Descriptions:
First part was a video interview that asked 7 basic questions. You had a specific amount of time to answer each question. 

After the video interview (if you are selected), there is a 2 part exam they have you take. Pretty easy basic questions. They will email a study guide prior to interview day. Once the exam is over you sit down with the nurse manager and discuss more about the position and asks you some more questions.
Interview Questions: How would I react in a case with a difficult parent?

title: Certified Nursing Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Children's Specialized Hospital (Mountainside, NJ)
Interview Descriptions: Came in to speak with HR, the woman told me more details about the job, such as pay and hours. I then took a CNA test online, when passed I was brought up to talk with the Nurse Manager and that was where the interview took place and was given a tour of the unit. A couple days later I was called and offered the job.

title: Housekeeping Supervisor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Children's Specialized Hospital (Mountainside, NJ) in Aug 2009
Interview Descriptions: the hiring process is fair but once your hired all hell break lose the housekeeping manager is a poor manger and nobody in upper management oversees him,no housekeeping manager works there from more them 2 years because of him.
Interview Questions: salary question because they are none profit

title: Scheduler Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Children's Specialized Hospital (Mountainside, NJ) in Jul 2009
Interview Descriptions: After applying online I got a call to come in for an interview 2 weeks later. I interviewed with HR & then the supervisor of scheduling. I was offered the position 2 days later.
